name: Machina Unclaspare
text: If this card is added to your hand, except by drawing it: You can Special Summon it, also you cannot Special Summon for the rest of this turn, except Machine monsters. If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can send 1 "Machina" monster from your Deck to the GY, except "Machina Unclaspare". You can only use each effect of "Machina Unclaspare" once per turn.
